track.name: Make It Wit Chu
comments: My favourite QOTSA song, along with I Appear Missing. Sexy.

These mysteries of life
That just ain't my thing

Ummmm how come this is not been heard before? What the fuck, it's my fave slow jam and not in this list, plus it's QOTSA. I need a bloody repeat button and something more than a love button, and say an obsessed one instead.
Getting such an awesome Rolling Stones vibe from this.
This track isn't on this album.  It's actually on the Desert Sessions 9 &10.  It's not actually QOTSA.  Just Josh jamming with buddies.
I wanna make out... I wanna make out wit Chew-bacc-a!
I wouldn't mind making it with Chu either.  Her sister, Chi, isn't quite my type though.
this haunting interlude is the best about this song
